title: List of West Virginia state parks
summary: There are 37 state parks in the U.S. state of West Virginia as of 2017.[lower-alpha 1] The West Virginia Division of Natural Resources (WVDNR) Parks and Recreation Section is the governing body for all 37 state parks and directly operates all but one of them.[lower-alpha 2] In addition to state parks, the WVDNR Parks and Recreation Section governs eight state forests.[5][6]
